column2: Synalloy Corp. engages in the production of stainless steel pipe, fabricator of stainless and carbon steel piping systems, and specialty chemicals. The company is headquartered in Glen Allen, Virginia and currently employs 607 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: the Metals Segment and the Specialty Chemicals Segment. The firm's Metals Segment comprises three subsidiaries: Synalloy Metals, Inc., which owns Bristol Metals, LLC (BRISMET), located in Bristol, Tennessee; Palmer of Texas Tanks, Inc. (Palmer), located in Andrews, Texas; and Specialty Pipe & Tube, Inc. (Specialty), located in Mineral Ridge, Ohio and Houston, Texas. The firm's Metals Segment manufactures stainless steel, other alloy pipe, storage solutions and separation equipment. The firm's Specialty Chemicals segment consists of the Company's subsidiary, Manufacturers Soap and Chemical Company (MS&C). The Specialty Chemicals Segment manufactures lubricants, surfactants, reaction intermediaries, sulfated fats and oils, and chemical tolling manufacturing resources.
